title: Splitting model and using threads.
body_html: Hello everyone. I am new to tensorflow and had a doubt. How can I split a pre trained model into two parts and then load it onto the GPU simultaneously using different threads ? Is it possible, if yes, please guide me for the same. Thanks :) :)
